title: Easy Chicken and Vegetable Pie
ingredients: ['1 egg yolk', '1 litre chicken stock', '150g peas (fresh or frozen)', '2 carrots, thickly sliced', '2 potatoes, cubed', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '20g butter', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '500g cooked chicken, cut into pieces', '1 pinch nutmeg', '1 sheet ready-made shortcrust pastry']
